Buildings

BLUE STAR SCANNER

The scanner will send a battleship to the detected blue star. System blue stars extremely short-lived; since the stars are constantly quanta collapse into the dark, to be near them unsafe. All arrived battleships players will fire a t each other and the forces of "Cerberus" in the system. The owner of the last surviving battleship wins. You can move to another location for 1000 hydrogen for each sector.The minimum level of the planet to build a scanner-9. Cost - 20000, construction time 3 seconds. In the blue star system, players fight other players or bots (depending on the activity of the players at that time).

For more information on BS can be found in the Stars.

SHIPMENT RELAY

Allows the delivery of goods from planets or trading stations from these sectors at nominal cost for a short period of time. If there are several planets or a planet with satellites in the specified sector, the first colonized planet is delivered, then the satellite (s) of this planet. After that, the cargo is delivered from the second planet. Improve your transportation service to increase the number of controlled sectors and supply volumes. Star fragments and hydrogen are required to activate the transfer. Fragments can be obtained for completing tasks in blue star systems (BS). The station can be moved to another location for 1000 hydrogen for each sector.The minimum level of the planet for the construction of the station is 10. One building for the solar system.

Time Modulator

High-tech station, capable of absorbing the energy of the yellow star and manipulating time. Use it to speed up the flow of time near your yellow star. Improve it to increase the acceleration factor. The maximum possible level is -16. The minimum level of the planet for the construction of the modulator is 6. It is located only in the sector where the star is located. The modulator can be moved to another location in the sector for 1000 hydrogen.

Shipyard

The Shipyard is the station where all construction and upgrades are performed on spaceships. The level of a player's shipyard determines the total fleet capacity of your Empire. Can be relocated for 1,000+ Hydrogen for every sector moved.

Level Fleet Capacity Upgrade Cost upgrade Time

Research Station

Research station explores the artifacts. Holds a maximum of 4 artifacts, and at the same time only 1 artifact is investigated. You can dispose of all the artifacts loaded on parked transports (when the cells in science are full) at once. Can be moved to 200 + hydrogen for each sector. Scientific station is the only structure able to interact with artifacts (explore). As for the research station requires artifacts, acquired via scanner Red Stars, it is recommended to place the station close to the scanner Red Stars to reduce the cost of hydrogen during the move.

Short Range Scanner

The short range scanners are able to open the adjacent new sector. The opening of these sectors become virtually useless. The scanners have a radius of construction in two sectors from the planet with which you build it. Movement allowed only in the sector create over 500 of hydrogen. Carefully plan their placement.

Red Star Scanner

Red Star scanner (RS) can detect nearby stars for a certain time (up to 2 minutes). RS contain the dying planet with artifacts, also protected by the forces of Cererus. Other players can use their Scanners RS to get access to the same RS. Moving the scanner to another location will cost 1,000 hydrogen per sector. Enlisting in the Corporation will be available short-circuit private (only you and members of Your Corporation) or the total to choose from.

For information on obtaining the influence and requirements for passing Red Stars, see Stars.

Diplomacy station

The diplomacy station can create two-way hopping gates between two players. Once connected, both players can send ships to each other. Can be moved to another location for 2000 hydrogen per sector. The requirement for construction - the minimum level of the planet - 7. After construction, you can search with whom you can establish these relations.

Number Cost Build Time
1 25 000 8h
2 500 000 5d
3 4 000 000 10d

Warp Lane Hub

Warp Lane HUB are created in pairs, the activation lasts 24 hours.The cost of activation depends on the length of the area between the two hubs at the rate of 1AU=0.9 units of hydrogen. Once the line between the two selected warp nodes is switched on, the ships can move between them instantly and without hydrogen consumption. Is the input and output between sectors for the trade drone. The requirement for construction - the minimum level of the planet - 12. Each node can be moved over 4000 of hydrogen for each sector. The cost of construction is specified for both the warp node.

Trade Station

Trading stations produce loads like a planet, but they don't raise your credit and hydrogen storage limit. Requirement-the minimum level of the planet 13. The maximum storage is 18 cargo, capacity 1.5 load per hour. Moving to another location would cost 3,000 hydrogen per sector.

White star scanner

White stars (WS) are the star system where the Corporation fights against the Corporation. WS is a large-scale effort, which is based on the strategy and teamwork of members of the Corporation. Each participant can contribute to the fight for relics, providing up to two ships for action in the WS, one of which is combat, and the other or transport, or mining. Time of action in WS significantly slowed. Routes that typically take 30 seconds can take up to 5 hours. Time deceleration allows corporations to plan and adapt their strategy to a changing battlefield.

The cost of construction – 25,000 credits.

Construction time-instantly.

You can move 3,000 hydrogen to another location.

For more information on WS can be found in the Stars.
